title: Where can i get similar images like this??
content:
I need to create similar effect like showen in this graphics. can someone help me to get similar image like this. Any web link???

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103040122im_/http:/typophile.com/files/!cid_image001_6422.jpg)
author: artslons

comments.content: istockphoto.com is probably the most widely used source for inexpensive vector clip art.
but wht keyword should i use to search???
Whatever you do, don’t make your snowflakes five-sided like the example. True snowflakes are always six-sided.
